Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
wait(20)
Tool.Enabled = true Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) script:Remove()

local myCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myHumanoid or not Torso then script:Remove() end
local DEFAULT_SPEED = 16
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(1.0, 0.5, 0) fireSecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 1.0, 0.5) fire.Parent = Torso fire.Heat = 25 fire.Size = 3.0
for i = 1, 20 do myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = DEFAULT_SPEED + 2 * (20 - i) fire.Color = Color3.new(0, i/20, (20 - i)/20) wait(1) end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = DEFAULT_SPEED -- Just to check.
if fire then fire:Remove() end script:Remove()

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent
local DrinkAnim local DrinkSound local ScreamSound
local EnabledScript local SpeedScript
local myCharacter local myHumanoid
local smashy
local smashAnim local smashSound
if not Tool:FindFirstChild("ChangeEnabledCopy") then Tool.Enabled = true end
function smash(key) if key:lower() == "q" then smashy = Tool:FindFirstChild("Smashy") if smashy and smashy.Value == false then smashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SmashAnim) if smashAnim then smashAnim:Play() end wait(0.4) smashy.Value = true end end end
function onActivated() myCharacter = Tool.Parent if not myCharacter then return end myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myHumanoid then return end
if not Tool.Enabled then return end smashy = Tool:FindFirstChild("Smashy") if smashy and smashy.Value == true then return end Tool.Enabled = false
DrinkAnim = Tool:FindFirstChild("Drink") if DrinkAnim then DrinkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(DrinkAnim) end if DrinkAnim then DrinkAnim:Play() end
wait(0.5)
DrinkSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("DrinkSound") if DrinkSound then DrinkSound:Play() end
Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, -0.7)
wait(1.5)
SpeedScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpeedScript") if SpeedScript then SpeedScript = SpeedScript:Clone() SpeedScript.Parent = myCharacter SpeedScript.Disabled = false end
EnabledScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("ChangeEnabled") -- Using a script to change the enabled/disabled-ness of the tool, to avoid problems if EnabledScript then -- when tool is backspaced in the middle of use. EnabledScript = EnabledScript:Clone() EnabledScript.Name = "ChangeEnabledCopy" EnabledScript.Parent = Tool EnabledScript.Disabled = false end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(smash) end end
function onUnequipped() if DrinkAnim then DrinkAnim:Stop() end if DrinkSound then DrinkSound:Stop() end if ScreamSound then ScreamSound:Stop() end if smashAnim then smashAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local smashSound
while Tool:FindFirstChild("Smashy") == nil do wait() end
local smashy = Tool.Smashy smashy.Changed:connect(function() if smashy and smashy.Value == true then Tool.Enabled = false local potionClone = Potion:Clone() Potion.Transparency = 1.0
potionClone.CanCollide = true potionClone.Parent = game.Workspace
if smashSound then smashSound:Play() end
local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Parent = potionClone smoke.RiseVelocity = 1 smoke.Size = 5 smoke.Color = Color3.new(204/255, 102/255, 255/255)
local duration = 2.0
smashSound = Potion:FindFirstChild("SmashSound") if smashSound then smashSound:Play() end
potionClone.Transparency = 1.0
while duration > 0 do smoke.RiseVelocity = smoke.RiseVelocity + 0.5 smoke.Size = smoke.Size + 2.5 wait(0.1) duration = duration - 0.1 end
local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i] ~= vPlayer and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") then local distance = (potionClone.Position - players[i].Character.Torso.Position).magnitude if distance < 25.0 then if players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("SleepScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.SleepScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = players[i].Character cloneScript.Disabled = false
wait(0.1) local sleepy = cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") if sleepy then sleepy.Value = sleepy.Value + 6 end else local sleepy = players[i].Character.SleepScript:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") if sleepy then sleepy.Value = sleepy.Value + 6 end end end end end
if potionClone then potionClone:Remove() end
wait(18.0) Tool.Enabled = true Potion.Transparency = 0.0 if smashy then smashy.Value = false end end end)
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local backpack = nil
if vPlayer then backpack = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") end
local sleeping = false
local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then script:Remove() end
while script:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") == nil do wait() end
local toolInHand = nil local backpackItems = {} local zStorage = {}
local sleepVal = script.Sleepy sleepVal.Changed:connect(function() if sleepVal and sleepVal.Value > 5 and not sleeping then
local duration = 3.0 if script:FindFirstChild("Duration") and script.Duration.Value > 0 then duration = script.Duration.Value end
backpackItems = {} toolInHand = nil sleeping = true sleepVal.Value = 0
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] and children[i].className == "Tool" then toolInHand = children[i] toolInHand.Parent = nil end end
if backpack then local bChildren = backpack:GetChildren() for j = 1, #bChildren do if bChildren[j] then table.insert(backpackItems, bChildren[j]) bChildren[j].Parent = nil end end end
while duration > 0 do
local z = Instance.new("Part") z.Name = "Z" z.CFrame = (vCharacter.Head.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) z.CanCollide = false
local zMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") zMesh.Parent = z zMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65046096" zMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65020347" zMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.05, 0.05, 0.05)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, z:GetMass() * 208, 0) floatForce.Parent = z
z.Parent = game.Workspace
table.insert(zStorage, z)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() while z and zMesh and #zStorage > 0 do zMesh.Scale = zMesh.Scale + Vector3.new(0.005, 0.005, 0.005) wait(0.05) end end))
wait(0.25) duration = duration - 0.25
debris:AddItem(z, 1) end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end zStorage = {} -- free memory
wait(2.0) sleeping = false end end)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(60) if sleeping then wait(1.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end zStorage = {} -- free memory end script:Remove() end))
